A healthy diet with plenty of fruits, vegetables, lean protein, and whole grains can help manage asthma symptoms. Avoid processed foods, sugar, and unhealthy fats.

Low-impact exercises such as walking, swimming, and yoga are good for people with asthma. Avoid high-intensity or strenuous exercises that may trigger asthma symptoms.
